tag_list: web, strategy, creative, tyography, design, noded
overview:
Andreas Carlsson is a Web Strategist, Creative Director and Designer based in LinkÃ¶ping, Sweden. He is passionate about usability, user experiences and introducing social media to traditional organisations.

His international project roster includes work for AstraZeneca, ICA, Universal Music, Pfeizer, and Telenor amongst many other.

Since the mid-1990’s Andreas has co-founded several interactive and traditional creative agencies. He is a popular speaker and presenter who is often called upon to advise brands on web strategies and audience interaction.

Andreas likes escaping into the world of typography where he crafts new typefaces and explores the impact of type on our society. He has amassed one of the world’s largest collections of Tidyman pictograms.

Andreas is the co-author of â€œNoded - The untouchable businessâ€.
